org.openimaj.image.processing.transform

Class RemapProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.transform.RemapProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageProcessor<FImage>, Processor<FImage>, SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>

    public class RemapProcessor
extends Object
implements SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    ImageProcessor and associated static utility methods for transforming an image based on the pixel positions given by a distortion map: destination(x,y) = source(mapx(x,y), mapy(x,y)). This allows efficient implementation of highly non-linear mappings.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.openimaj.image.processor.SinglebandImageProcessor

        public void processImage(FImage image)
        Description copied from interface: ImageProcessor
        Process an image. Implementing classes must alter the image passed in-place or assign the output to the input using Image.internalAssign(Image).
        Specified by:
